Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Set/reducer

Function &T reducer(set[&T] s, &T (&T, &T) fn, &T unit)
Description Apply the function fn to successive elements of set s starting with unit.
Examples 
rascal>import Set;
ok
rascal>int add(int x, int y) { return x + y; }
int (int, int): int add(int, int);
rascal>reducer({10, 20, 30, 40}, add, 0); 
int: 100
[Edit] | [New] | [Compile Course] | [Warnings]
